name: DinoSaw
overview:
DinoSaw is a platform game where you play a cartoonish chainsaw-wielding caveman that is wandering around a prehistoric land looking to kill prehistoric animals. When you hit the monsters you get to see their blood flying around everywhere. As you stroll around you find different types of monsters that take different amounts of bashing to kill.

Two versions exist; the free version ships with four levels while the full version features more levels and a two-player mode.
